additional_template_information: These are the global theme styles configured through the Elementor Theme Styles area.
This is a "Header" template for Elementor Pro.
This template will display on: Entire Site.
This is a "Footer" template for Elementor Pro.
This template will display on: Entire Site.
This is a "Archive" template for Elementor Pro.
This template will display on: All Archives.
This is a "Search Results" template for Elementor Pro.
This template will display on: Search Results.
This is a "Single Post" template for Elementor Pro.
This template will display on: Posts.
This is a "Error 404" template for Elementor Pro.
This template will display on: 404 Page.
